title: PBE signup
body: I am signed up to PBE for almost year and a half and still not accepted. Is it normal or do anybody have a solution to this problem? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: What if i used to have a PBE account? how can i download it and use it??

prestame una xDD estoy loco por una cuenta en el pbe :c
{{summoner:31}}

I saw that you applied back in 2016, but it doesn't look like you've been invited to join the pbe servers quite yet. We typically choose people based on what we're testing, for example we might have invited a large number of Galio mains when we were testing his changes. Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for all the deets on how PBE works.

I am looking for 3 years now for all PBE-News, but I get no feedback since today? I know many players who get a PBE, but don't know what PBE is or think "here is everything cheap and i can test the new champs". Why you don't  look for people who are interested on PBE and not abuse it? Maybe do some survery about PBE-Stuff and LoL-Dev. So  people who answer it quite good have a higher chance to get a pbe acc.
how time check my request going to PBE.i wan't test rakan xayah and new hextech chest more skin beauty

Got accepted on pbe after i got my ban lmao 
Can i still play on my former-main pbe account or the permaban is affecting the pbe too
Try to main new champs for a while or those that will soon get reworked
